Detailed Description

Implements readline functionality with tab-completion and command callbacks.

To function it needs a command-tree dict containing the command structure. Names prefixed with '$' will be wildcards and will be passed to the final command as named arguments.

 commandTreeExample = {
   'hello' : cmd_print_hello,
   'print' : {'$message': cmd_print_message},
   'show' : {
     'all': cmd_show_all,
     'one': cmd_show_one,
   }
 }
 shell = CommandShell(commandTreeExample)
 shell.input("Prompt> ")
